eu.cassandra.sim.utilities
Class DerbyResults

java.lang.Object
  eu.cassandra.sim.utilities.DerbyResults
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBResults
public class DerbyResults
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBResults

The wrapper class for storing simulation output results in an Apache Derby database.

Author:
Fani A. Tzima (fani [dot] tzima [at] iti [dot] gr)
